law.catch_line: Exemption of Kentucky Access and the department from state and local taxes.
law.text: Kentucky Access and the department shall be exempt from all taxes levied by the state or any of its subdivisions.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1285, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 476, sec. 14, effective July 14, 2000.
